title: 03/28/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/28/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps an action filled weekend in sports and entertainment. Who was in the wrong in the Will Smith/Chris Rock altercation at the Oscars? Entertainment Tonight's Kevin Frazier and Nischelle Turner tell us what went on behind the scenes. And Jay Bilas discusses the remaining teams in the NCAA tournament.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
